job.description: REDiTECH (Red-Eye-Tek)Our MissionâWe strive to deliver a truly remarkable service that provides our Clients the ability to utilize technology in reliable and innovative ways.âOur Vision:To merge technology and security to solve intricate business problems for all companies.Our Values:Act like an OWNERHave a GROWTH mindsetHONESTY is non-negotiableINTEGRITY is our most valuable assetShow DEDICATION in all tasksApproach all problems with CREATIVITYWhere We Are Today:We are currently in a rapid growth pattern and we are looking for solid team players that want to come along for the ride. Technical skills are a given for a System Engineer, but we are also looking to bring on technicians with great personalities, positive attitudes, and an unshakable drive to succeed. We are growing and evolving and that type of environment will keep you on your toes. If you are motivated by growth, problem solving, and accountability we want to hear from you!Job purpose:Systems Administrators will provide and demonstrate high level of customer service and ensure client satisfaction of service. Systems Administrators will be responsible for maintaining and accurately documenting all work within service tickets, as well as technical documentation for the office and their equipment. We are looking for a competent Systems Administrators to provide fast and useful technical assistance on computer systems. You will answer questions on basic technical issues and offer advice to solve them.
